page.title: 15Sheltered Homes - Newburgh
page.content: Newburgh has sheltered housing right in the middle of the town. The sheltered homes were built in 1981. There are seventeen occupants and two wardens _ Mrs Kidd and another person. Mrs Kidd lives in one of the houses. They are situated where the Public Hall used to be. It was also a cinema and films were shown there. It is mostly elderly people of 65 or more who live there. Each person has a button which they can press if the warden is needed. The warden helps with the house work, but does the washing most of the time. The sheltered homes are such a pretty sight, They built them with all their might, Brick by brick, Layer by layer, The sheltered homes are such a pretty sight.
